title: november 12: portrait of a (loch ness) monster (with Miloe)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about a photograph that may or may not have been of the Loch Ness Monster. Afterwards, she tells a little known tale of a famous rapper’s humble beginnings. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
